com.accenture.adf.newcodington.module10.activity
Class Zoo

java.lang.Object
  com.accenture.adf.newcodington.module10.activity.Zoo

public class Zoo
extends java.lang.Object

Zoo class overrides the methods inherited from the interface RidesHosting Zoo hosts High Trill rides The variable zooride is used to represent different types of rides The zooride value is 1 if the rides is a High Thrill ride for Children and 2 if the ride is a High Thrill ride for teens and adults
